sentences.en: A big wave just hit Dan. He fell off his surfboard!
sentences.cn: 凯蒂:刚刚来了一波大浪,丹恩从冲浪板上掉下来了!

sentences.en: A surfboard fin sliced the crest of a wave.
A used surfboard costs about $ 200, much too high a price to pay for most Senegalese.
sentences.cn: 一块二手的冲浪板要价在200美元左右, 大多数的塞内加尔人都付不起这么高的价钱.
马克:丹恩从冲浪板上掉下来了.

sentences.en: Get a feel for paddling around on the surfboard and the balance of it.
sentences.cn: 然后在冲浪板上感受一下向各个方向的冲浪感和平衡感.

sentences.en: Grab 6 your surfboard, sunscreen, and swimsuit, then head to the Gold Coast for a great time.
sentences.cn: 拿起您的冲浪板 、 防晒油及泳衣泳裤, 前往黄金海岸欢度美好时光.

sentences.en: He borrowed a friend's surfboard and paddled out into the ocean at sunset.
sentences.cn: 他借了一个朋友的冲浪板，在日落的时候划入了大海。

sentences.en: I used my arms like a swimmer to move the surfboard through the water.
sentences.cn: 我像个泳者一样,在水里用我的手臂来划动冲浪板.

sentences.en: I've actually never tired. Do you a surfboard?
sentences.cn: 我真的没试过,你有冲浪板 吗 ?

sentences.en: In the beginning, she put Faith a surfboard to let him feel the movement.
sentences.cn: 开始时, 她把“信念”放在冲浪板上,让它感觉运动.

sentences.en: Last year, California surfer Todd Endris was on his surfboard when a shark appeared.
sentences.cn: 去年, 加州冲浪者陶德.恩德斯站在他的冲浪板上时,一只鲨鱼竟出现了.

sentences.en: Look how handsome he is as he rides on his surfboard.
sentences.cn: 你看他站在冲浪板上乘风破浪,多潇洒!

sentences.en: Nancy : You a board , likes surfboard , but you go down hills on snow , like skiing.
sentences.cn: 好棒,这种运动我喜欢, 是把滑雪和冲浪结合在一起.

sentences.en: Sports equipment: multi - color rope skipping, surfboard safety rope.
sentences.cn: 运动器材: 多色 跳绳 、 冲浪板安全绳索.

sentences.en: Where can I rent a surfboard?
sentences.cn: 我要到哪里去租冲浪板?

words.tran_cn: 冲浪运动员，乘冲浪板冲浪的人

trans.tran_en: a long piece of plastic, wood etc that you stand on when you go surfing
